Title: When you leave the workshop, pay attention to keep warm; avoid catching a cold and ensure to turn up for work
Publisher: Shanghai shi weisheng fangyi zhan (上海市衞生防疫站), Zhongguo hong shizi hui Shanghai shi fenhui (中國紅十字會上海市分會)
Notes: A female textile worker puts on a warm coat before leaving the workshop.A similar image is PC-1955-019.
